snippet: The service’s music feature is still hidden from the public, but it appears to be a way to learn what music is becoming popular.
abstract: Twitter will introduce music feature that is expected to use listening habits of users' friends and contacts to generate recommendations; exact format of application remains unclear.
lead_paragraph: The service’s music feature is still hidden from the public, but it appears to be a way to learn what music is becoming popular.

headline.seo: Clues Emerge About Twitter’s Music Feature
headline.main: Twitter Will Introduce a Music Application
headline.print_headline: Twitter Will Introduce A Music Application
